item.title: Narcissism of Small Differences
item.description: in psychoanalysis, the narcissism of small differences is the idea that the more a relationship or community shares commonalities, the more likely the people in it are to engage in interpersonal feuds and mutual ridicule because of hypersensitivity to minor differences perceived in each other

item.title: Parable of the Polygons
item.description: Parable of the Polygons Metadata Author: [ncase.me] Title: Parable of the Polygons Reference: https://ncase.me/polygons/ Highlights Small individual bias can lead to large collective bias.

item.title: Tragedy of Commons
item.description: situation where people use a shared resource (such as land, water, air, etc.) without considering the impact on others or the future.

item.title: Partition by W.H Auden
item.description: by W.H. Auden About the Author Summary and themes about the India - Pakistan partition in 1947 angry about partition, directed towards Radcliffe

item.title: Sailing to Byzantium by WB Yeats
item.description: by ![[WB Yeats]] written in 1926 Yeats was in his 60s “the state of my soul and some of my thoughts about the subject”
